title: Jerome Powell Is Popular. His War on Inflation Could Change That.
description: Jerome H. Powell, who is well liked across the political spectrum, is presiding over the fastest interest rate increases in generations, with another one expected this week.
dc:creator: Jeanna Smialek
media:description: Fed policy is made by committee, but the chair is the central bankâ€™s most visible policymaker, and complaints are likely to be lobbed at Jerome H. Powell personally.
